hero.title: Your Gateway to Global Education Starts Here.
hero.subtitle: Making world-leading education accessible to everyone.

whyDS.title: Why DS Education
whyDS.subtitle: Why Choose Us
whyDS.description: DS Education was founded by a team of experienced professionals committed to offering free consultancy services to students and those abroad. Our team is passionate in guiding students every step of their way through their chosen University application, admission and student visa process. At DS Education, we are inspired to help students to achieve their educational goals one choice at a time.

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Who We Are
about.description1: DS Education has been formed in 2022 by an expert in education who provides education opportunities supporting overseas education service to UK, Malta, Singapore, USA among others. We are a reputed based company and is located in both Jakarta and Cambodia.
about.description2: Our mission is to provide accessible education consultation services to students looking to pursue their academic dreams abroad.

mission.title: MISSION
mission.description: To provide consultancy services and support for international courses for English and other top universities.

vision.title: VISION
vision.description: To be the most preferred educational consulting agency.

coreValues.title: CORE VALUES
coreValues.description: Committed Delivery, Perseverance, Trust and Supportive.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: What We Offer
services.intro: Comprehensive education services to support your journey from start to finish
services.pageSubtitle: Explore more opportunities with our study abroad consultancy and services. We provide overseas placements, visa assistance, and translation services for a seamless experience. Our study tours and accommodation support ensure comfort that meet your needs. Embark your study abroad journey with us today and let us make your dreams a reality!

translation.title: Translation Service
translation.description: We provide translation service from the local language to English.

studyTour.title: Study Tour
studyTour.description: We provide the students the experiences of studying and living overseas before they make their choice of foreign country to study.
details: During our study tour, the students will experience studying, living and the culture of the country they do the study tour.
We are also assisting students and student parents to visit the schools or universities they wish to visit during the trip.

visa.title: Visa Guidance
visa.description: We are providing the professional service for visa preparation and process for many types of visa to overseas.

consultation.title: Study Abroad Consultation
consultation.description: Our team will assist the students who wish to study overseas to their country of choice since the beginning of the process until the student graduate.
details: Consultation to the better choice of countries, subjects, university choices for students

foundation.title: DS Foundation
foundation.description: DS Foundation is the foundation which is formed by DS Overseas Education Consultant in order to provide the opportunities to less fortune students from less developed areas in Cambodia to continue studying their degree.

accommodation.title: Accommodation Arrangement
accommodation.description: Our accommodation arrangement services help international students to find comfortable and affordable housing in their new country. We assist in securing the best options based on your budget and preferences to ensure a smooth transition and a great start to your academic journey.

testimonial.title: TESTIMONIAL
testimonial.subtitle: Student Success Stories
testimonial.quote: I became a student at Pine DS Education. The feedback I received in the UK, is not just for study but also for everyday life. I personally think being in Pine for 2+ years has been so well that currently am in graduate programme studying at a particular university in the UK. I am thankful to DS Education and I hope that other students also get the opportunity to gain the experience and share the knowledge like me.
testimonial.author: SASAT Chander

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Get In Touch
contact.description: Unhappy on an education issue? DS Education facilitates the delivery of learning through guidance. Reach out to us today!
contact.formIntro: Fill out the form below and we'll get back to you within 24 hours.
contact.successMessage: We'll get back to you as soon as possible.

foundation.pageSubtitle: Empowering students from less developed areas to achieve their educational dreams
foundation.aboutDescription: DS Foundation is the foundation which is formed by DS Overseas Education Consultant in order to provide the opportunities to less fortune students from less developed areas in Cambodia to continue studying their degree. We believe that education is the key to breaking the cycle of poverty and creating a brighter future.

compassion.title: Compassion
compassion.description: We care deeply about every student's future and well-being

opportunity.title: Opportunity
opportunity.description: Creating pathways to quality education for underprivileged students

community.title: Community
community.description: Building a network of support for students and families

testimonialsPage.pageSubtitle: Hear from our successful students who achieved their educational dreams

stats.subtitle: Our Impact

stats.description: Join thousands of students who have achieved their dreams with our guidance
